pluginstrument.author: Jason Tatum
pluginstrument.description:
Modification by Brian McMullan Property for background off/on (default ON) Property for dimming overlay (default OFF)
Uses A2A indicated airspeed if available, with a temperature of 15 degrees C at a pressure altitude of 0 ft(sea level) with a pressure set at 1013hpa (or 29.92 inHg).
